title: PBE down for maintenance
body: ummm so the PBE has been down for maintenance for almost 24 hours now??? wtf is going on?!?!

replies.body: This is something we're aware of, and are working to get PBE back up as soon as possible. It seems like they had a little more maintenance to do than they originally thought! {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
My PBE is not downloading, I just qualified for it and it's downloading at like 300 kbps
thank you for letting us know, we are all anxious and its a little hectic but thank you for talking time to tell us ~fan for life
